page.title: 06REGENCY BEDDING
page.content: The warehouse is on Lowlands Estate and the shop is in Church Road ,St Sampson's.The business involves making bed bases and mattresses,and is owned by English men living on the island.They employ fifteen people and produce 15 to 20 beds a day.At present they import all their materials, and export 75% of their output.They make 13 different qualities of mattresses. In the standard range the quilted are cheaper than the tufted mattresses. There are two different materials used to cover a mattress and 15 different patterns of material.The company have produced such good results that they are about to expand and have built another warehouse behind the shop where they are to make their own headboards and springs.
